Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Ultiqa Beach Haven Outdoor Pool Ultiqa Beach Haven Living Room Ultiqa Beach Haven Twin Share Bedroom Ultiqa Beach Haven Indoor Area Gold Coast ULTIQA Beach Haven on Broadbeach &vert; Return flights • 7 nights Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Located opposite Kurrawa Beach, ULTIQA Beach Haven on Broadbeach is the perfect Gold Coast getaway. Views of the Pacific Ocean, Gold Coast coastline and hinterland views combine with relaxed apartments, creating a family-friendly coastal destination. The property offers 3.5 star accommodation with 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. Each apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living space, laundry facilities, complimentary WiFi, Foxtel Business iQ, and secure undercover parking. View more View less 7 nights + flights from $ 1509 per person family share (2 ad & 2 kids 2-11 yrs) Flying with Air New Zealand Enquire now Sale Period : until 16 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: Return Economy Class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Brisbane 7 nights accommodation FREE Wi-Fi Welcome gift 1 car park per booking FREE pool towel hire Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Two Bedroom Ocean View 1 x Queen bed or 2 x Single bed Auckland 7 night package from $1559 per person family share (2 ad & 2 kids 2-11 yrs) Additional night from $105 per person family share Travel 27 Jan - 31 Mar 26, 20 Apr - 13 May 26, 18 May - 30 Jun 26, 19 Jul - 24 Aug 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1569 per person family share (2 ad & 2 kids 2-11 yrs) Additional night from $105 per person family share Travel 27 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1509 per person family share (2 ad & 2 kids 2-11 yrs) Additional night from $105 per person family share Travel 20 Apr - 13 May 26, 18 May - 25 Jun 26, 20 Jul - 24 Aug 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1579 per person family share (2 ad & 2 kids 2-11 yrs) Additional night from $105 per person family share Travel 28 Jan - 31 Mar 26, 19 Apr - 13 May 26, 18 May - 02 Jul 26, 19 Jul - 24 Aug 26 Families come in all shapes and sizes. If the advertised room type doesn't suit your family, ask us for a customised quote below. Please note the room images displayed are suggestive only as the apartments are individually owned and furnished. Gold Coast Sightseeing Optional Add-ons Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary General Admission Experience our native Australian wildlife unlike ever before at Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, located on the Southern Gold Coast. Your ticket includes admission to the Sanctuary, use of the miniature train, access to the Lost Valley, Extinction Trail, Wild Island Adventure Splash Zone, interactive shows & presentations, and our the new precinct, Outback Springs! Learn all about the Sanctuary’s extensive conservation initiatives and enjoy wide open spaces as you admire iconic species such as the kangaroo, Tasmanian devil, Koala, wombat, echidna, reptiles, colourful parrots & cockatoos, and so much more! Includes: • Includes admission to the Sanctuary • Use of the miniature train • Access to the Lost Valley, Extinction Trail, Wild Island Adventure Splash Zone, interactive shows & presentations and Outback Springs. Operates: Daily except April 25 and December 25 Opening hours: 9am-4pm Price from $72 per adult, $56 per child (3-13 years), Family pass from $239 per family (2 adults & 2 children 3-13 yrs) Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary - Grazy Arvo with Koalas Relax and enjoy an afternoon with our Koalas. Spend some time with our Aussie icons in our exclusive Koala Habitat area while you indulge in a scrumptious grazing platter with hand-selected cheeses, breads and antipasto delights prepared by our Sanctuary chefs, plus a glass of wine, beer or soft drink. Surrounded by Koalas, chat with our keepers, enjoy a koala interaction, and have the moment captured by our professional photographer to take home and cherish forever. Includes: • Grazing Platter (selection seasonal fruits, breads, cheeses and antipasto) • Beverage (choice of alcoholic beverage for 18+) • Pat & chat style encounter hosted by our experienced Koala keepers • 1 x Koala cuddle and photo per paying guest • General admission to Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary (from 9am). Operates: Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday Time: 2pm Duration: 1 hour Price from $155 per adult, $145 per child (3-13 years) Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary Breakfast with Koalas Head to our Koala Habitat, home to everyone’s favorite Aussie icon, for a breakfast experience like no other. Indulge in a gourmet breakfast, surrounded by Koalas, chat with our Koala Specialists, enjoy a Koala interaction, and have the moment captured by our professional photographer to take home and cherish forever. Learn about Koalas as a species, their unique adaptations, and the conservation efforts that Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary are involved in. Afterwards, explore more of the Sanctuary at your leisure. Includes: Includes general admission to the Sanctuary, gourmet set menu breakfast (four choices), beverage (tea, coffee or juice), pat & chat style encounter, Koala photo & professional photo to take home. Operates: Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday Time: 8am Duration: 1 hour Price from $155 per adult, $145 per child (3-13years) Paradise Jet Boating : Jet Blast Ride Paradise Jet Boating has been operating since 2004 and is Australia’s leading jet boat operator. The rides have become famous for the great combination of thrills and adventure mixed with wonderful scenery and sightseeing. Enjoy a mixture of 360° spins, high-speed drifting and other exciting manoeuvres through the beautiful Gold Coast ‘Broadwater’. Scenery ranges from unspoilt Marine Park views while spotting dolphins, island wallabies and a wide variety of birdlife; to the amazing Superyachts and grand waterfront mansions of Sovereign Islands. Includes: • Tour • Life jackets • Storage lockers for personal belongings Operates: Daily except Christmas day Time: 9:15am, 10:15am, 1:15pm, 4:15pm Duration: 40 minutes Price from $75 per adult, $55 per child (4-14 years) Lady Elliot Island Day Tour (ex Gold Coast option) The Lady Elliot Island Great Barrier Reef all-inclusive Day Tour is the only one of its type in Australia. The visit allows you to view one of the most pristine sections of Australia’s Great Barrier Reef from the air as well as from above and below the water all in one day. Your tour commences with a pickup from your city hotel between 6.00 - 6.30 am and a complimentary transfer to the Airport for a scenic flight to the coral cay of Lady Elliot Island. Lady Elliot is regarded as one of the best snorkeling and diving locations on the reef, famous for its unspoilt coral reef and an amazing array of marine life! Upon arrival on Lady Elliot Island, the guide will take you on a brief orientation tour of the island and will escort you to the Day Guest facilities to collect your snorkel equipment. You will then join a glass-bottom boat & guided snorkel tour to view a large variety of coral and brilliantly colored fish, with the possibility to encounter turtles, dolphins, and the resident manta rays. A hot & cold buffet lunch is served in the Beachfront Dining Room and includes a choice of wine, beer, and soft drink. After lunch, join your guide for fish feeding in the Fish Pond, and at 2.30 pm, depart on a scenic flight back to the Airport. The tour concludes at between 4.15 pm - 4.30 pm with a return transfer back to your hotel. A light breakfast and afternoon tea (water & biscuit) are served inflight. Includes: • Return land Transfers (courtesy pick-up from selected accommodation - limited areas apply) • Welcome drink on arrival • Fully guided tour • In Flight receive light snack, afternoon tea, bottled water and biscuit • On Island receive tea and coffee • Combined glass bottom boat/guided snorkel tour • Hot & Cold Buffet lunch including fresh prawns, beer, wine & soft drink • Use of snorkel equipment (mask, snorkel, fins & short wetsuit) • Fish feeding in the Lagoon Fish Pool • Snorkel lesson (if required) • Afternoon activity (tide dependent) • Use of Day Guest facilities (storage facilities, shower facilities, towels, sunscreen, reef walking shoes) • Environmental Management Charge (EMC) • Return scenic flight to Lady Elliot Island Operates: Daily except Christmas Day Time: 6am-5pm Duration: 5hrs & 30 minutes Price from $1,109 per adult, $779 per child (3-12years) AU$50 Harbour Town Premium Outlets Gift Card Harbour Town Premium Outlets is Australia's largest Outlet shopping centre, all open-air, located on Queensland's Gold Coast, a 15 minute drive north from Surfers Paradise. Home to over 220 premium Outlets stores, including international brands and iconic Australian labels, offering huge savings of up to 70% off! You’ll always find a sale, with every store having a minimum of 30% off daily! And after all that shopping, sit back and enjoy a bit to eat or refreshing drink at Harbour Town Eats alfresco dining and entertainment precinct. Includes: 1x AU$50 Harbour town Gift Card (max 1 per booking) Operates: Daily except Good Friday (29 March 2025), ANZAC Day (25 April 2025) and Christmas Day (25 December 2025) Time: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday 9.00 am-5.30pm, Thursday-9.00am-7.00pm, Sunday 10.00am-5.00pm. Public Holiday Trading 10.00am-5.00pm Price from $35 - Please note selected eateries, supermarkets and entertainment venues operate outside Harbour Town’s official trading hours. Harbour Town trading hours are subject to change. For current trading hours, please refer to https://www.harbourtowngoldcoast.com.au/centre-services/opening-hours Aquaduck 1 Hour Tour Departing from the heart of Surfers Paradise, the iconic Aquaduck tour offers a perfect blend of city sightseeing and river cruising. See the sights of Surfers Paradise before experiencing the famous “splash down” into the Broadwater for a calm water cruise taking in the spectacular views of the Gold Coast. Kids even get to steer the duck on the water and take home a souvenir ‘Captains certificate’. Includes: Tour guide and on-board commentary. 20 Minute city tour and then 40 minutes river cruise. Operates: Daily Time : 09:45am, 10:15am, 11:00am, 11.30am, 12:15pm, 2pm, 2:15pm, 3:15pm, 3:30pm, 4:30pm, 4:45pm Duration: 1 hour Aquaduck tour Price from $65 per adult, $55 per child (2-16 years), $196 Family Pass (2A2C (2-11yrs)) Gold Coast Skippered Canal Cruise Experience the beautiful Gold Coast on this private guided cruise. Enjoy a flexible itinerary - cruises last from one to five hours - and a quiet ride on this custom built boat with an electric motor. Check out amazing views of sites like Main Beach, Southport, Cronin’s Island, and Isle of Capri. Marvel at the million-dollar homes and gorgeous canals, elegant bridges and marine life that could include dolphins, turtles, and sea eagles. Includes: Skippered Sightseeing cruise Small-group tour (maximum of 10 people) Operates: Daily Duration: 1 hour cruise Price from $235 for group of 1-10 people Gold Coast Self-Drive Boat Rental Be your own boat captain with a leisurely cruise through the Gold Coast’s scenic canals. Even without experience or a boating license, you can pilot a canopy-covered electric vessel with room for up to 10 friends or family members. You decide where to go and when to stop, enjoying unparalleled views from the water of Gold Coast luxury homes, beaches, and marine life. Includes: Safety equipment Operates: Daily Duration: up to 4 hours Price from $189 for group of 1-10 people Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 16 Nov 25 or until sold out. • Prices are correct as at 31 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. Price is based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Packages are subject to availability. • Advertised packages are based on Return Economy Class (The Works) flights flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Brisbane • Flights are restricted to selected day of the week schedules. • Day of the week surcharges may apply • Min/max stays apply • Family share is based on 2 adults and 2 children sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary. • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 18 Sep 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
